examples.example: 我每天都会利用电脑学习新的知识和技能。

translate.english: I use the computer every day to learn new knowledge and skills.

examples.example: 我通过电脑了解到了丰富多彩的世界。

translate.english: I learned about the rich and colorful world through the computer.

examples.example: 我用电脑绘制出了一幅美丽的图画，成就感满满。

translate.english: I used the computer to draw a beautiful picture and was full of a sense of accomplishment.
